summary: AFTER SMELLING STRONG ODOR OF GAS,(CAR IDLING) CALLED DEALERSHIP AND THEY TOLD ME TO CHECK OIL LEVEL. THE OIL LEVEL WAS OVER FULL AND SMELLED LIKE GAS . OTHER HONDA VEHICLES WHICH HAVE THE SAME 1.5T ENGINE HAVE REPORTED THE SAME ISSUE HERE IN THE STATES.  I AM TOLD HONDA RECOMMENDS MONITORING THE OIL LEVEL AND CHANGING IT EVERY 500 MILES UNTIL THIS PROBLEM IS REMEDIED. WHAT IF SOMEONE DOESN'T REALIZE THEIR OIL LEVEL IS OVERFULL AND THE OIL SYSTEM OVER PRESSURIZES OR THE GAS IGNITES INSIDE THE OIL SUMP WHILE DRIVING? AFTER RESEARCHING THIS PROBLEM SOME HONDA CARS USING THIS SAME 1.5T ENGINES IN CANADA AND CHINA ARE ALSO EXPERIENCING THE SAME ISSUE.
